hanzi-su-wiki:
姦

Значения

Крикливый; плохой, развратный

Мнемоника

Девушки 女, собравшиеся группой для разврата.

Варианты

奸
purpleculture_pinyin:
jiān
to fornicate; to defile; adultery; rape
прелюбодействовать; осквернять; супружеская измена; изнасилование
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 奸)
Antonyms: 忠
Ideographic: Someone who flirts with many women 女
purpleculture_examples:
姦淫 [ jiān yín ]: fornication; adultery; rape; seduction
奸臣 [ jiān chén ]: a treacherous court official; a minister who conspires against the state

Kanshudo_mnemonic: three women (女) are noisy (!)
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Many women violate me at the same time. Then I woke up. Adultery dreams, jeez.
humanum_full_description_en:
Elaboration: The three " females " from Bronze Inscriptions , suspected that the original meaning is fornication. Not observing women's way, Hongxing goes out of the wall and is called "adultery." The ancients had a prejudice against women, thinking that women are a disaster, and being close to females is detrimental to virtue, so the word " rape " from " female ". The derogatory words from " female " are " absolute ", " greed ", " lazy " (" lazy "), " slave " (such as slave, miser), " angry " and so on.

One said " rape " is a knowing and shape the sound of the word, " Nuan " is " evil " sound character (Xu in the country).

"Zuo Zhuan. "The 19th Year of Lord Zhuang": "Mrs. Jiang's Ru Ju", Du pre-annotated: "If you go to the country without your parents, you will be an adulterer." Kong Yingdashu: "Women don't use courtesy as an adulterer." Private. From the third daughter. 𢙶, the ancient literary is a traitor from the heart, and the sound of drought.” Duan Yucai's note: "The third daughter is also a traitor. It is a gentleman who is far-sighted and worthy." Jiang Yuan "Shuowen Shilu": " Fornication is called rape, and it is extended to all the characters for rape. Common uses rape as rape, and rape is the word for rape."

" Addict " has the meaning of adultery. Fornication means disloyal to your spouse. Later, the word " rape " generally refers to all evil and improper behavior, which means hypocrisy, fraud, and defeat, and can mean stealing. "Adultery" is also called "affair." "Guang Ya. Interpretation: "Traitor, steal too." "Zuo Zhuan. "Eighteenth Year of Wengong": "Stealing bribes is stealing, stealing weapons is a traitor." Kong Yingdashu: "Stealing people and weapons is called a traitor." Here, " bribery " refers to ordinary property, and in "Zuo Zhuan" " device " as the multi-finger "Yi device" like "treasures" also refers to ancestral boat. This is why later generations have the so-called "stealing of the country", and "theft of weapons as a traitor" actually refers to "traitors" who have major intentions (see "Shangshu. Shundian"). " Traitful " means stealing and is also used as a verb, as in "Huainanzi. General Theory": "Tragic talisman festival, stealing control gold." Gao Luu's note: "Traitory, private, also stealing. Talisman becoming a letter, and stealing it." The whole sentence means stealing the talisman festival, stealing the key and seal (Zhao Zongyi ).

In modern Chinese, " rape " is a simplified word for " rape ". In ancient times, " rape " and " rape " are different words. The original meaning of " rape " means offense. The pronunciation of " rape " and " rape " is the same, so it can be used as an interrogation. See " rape ".

Bronze inscriptions in the Shang Dynasty were used as the clan name. The early " rape " used as the proper name did not have negative meanings such as adultery. It was merely a clan emblem. In the middle of the Western Zhou Dynasty, the inscription expresses hypocrisy, and Chang Bengzhen: "Jing Bo (Xing Bo)'s (only) Yin (夤) does not rape. Chang Bong scorns 𤯌." "Zhikui" means devotion, and "not rape" is not hypocritical. , Sincerely, "Guang Ya. "Explanation": "True, false." (Yu Shengwu, Chen Mengjia)

Mawangdui Silk Book "Book of Political Strategists in the Warring States Period. "Li Yuan said Xinwu Zhang": "The swallow made Cai Niaoqu Fu Pangbi, who trespassed Zhao to enter the Qin Dynasty, and he used the ten cities in the river to seal Qin Xiangwen's letter." " Traitory " is pronounced as " jian ", which means stealing, Cai Niao concealed symbols in the stock. Hidden the bi in the armpit, stole beyond Zhao and went to Qin. "Historical Records. Biographies of Dawan: "And those who treacherous things from Shu Jia, or Zhi Yan." "Han Shu. Zhang Qian Biography "" traitor "for" between "(Wang Hui).
humanum_short_description_en: Synopsis: The three " females " from the bronze inscriptions, suspect that the original meaning is fornication. Not observing women's way, Hongxing goes out of the wall and is called "adultery." The ancients had a prejudice against women, thinking that women are a disaster, and being close to females is detrimental to virtue, so the word " rape " from " female ".
humanum_full_description:
金文從三「女」，疑本義是私通。不守婦道，紅杏出牆稱為「通姦」。古人對女人有偏見，認為女人是禍水，近女色即損德，所以「姦」字從「女」。從「女」而有貶義的字還有「妄」、「婪」、「嬾」(「懶」)、「奴」(如奴才、守財奴)、「怒」等。

　　一說「姦」是會意兼形聲字，「奻」是「姦」的聲符(徐在國)。

　　《左傳．莊公十九年》：「夫人姜氏如莒」，杜預注：「非父母國而往，書姦。」孔穎達疏：「婦人不以禮出為姦。」《說文》：「姦，私也。从三女。𢙶，古文姦从心，旱聲。」段玉裁注：「亦三女爲姦。是以君子遠色而貴德。」江沅《說文釋例》：「私淫曰姦，引申為一切姦宄字，俗乃用奸為姦，而姦專為姦宄字矣。」

　　「姦」有通姦之義，私通即是對配偶不忠誠，敗亂綱紀倫常。後來，「姦」字泛指一切邪惡、不正當的行為，有虛偽、欺詐、敗亂之意，並可表示偷盜。「通姦」又稱「偷情」。《廣雅．釋詁》：「姦，盜也。」《左傳．文公十八年》：「竊賄為盜，盜器為姦。」孔穎達疏：「盜人器用，謂之為姦。」此中的「賄」指一般的財物，而《左傳》中的「器」則多指如「彝器」之類的「重寶」，也即指宗廟社稷。此所以後世有所謂「竊國」之說，而「盜器為姦」便實指懷有重大企圖的「姦宄」(見《尚書．舜典》)。「姦」表示偷盜，又用作動詞，如《淮南子．氾論》：「姦符節，盜管金。」高誘注：「姦，私，亦盜也。符節成信也，而盜取之。」全句表示盜竊符節，偷取管鑰、印璽(趙宗乙)。

　　現代漢語「奸」是「姦」的簡化字，古代「奸」、「姦」是不同的字，「奸」本義是干犯，「奸」、「姦」音同，故可通假。參見「奸」。

　　商代金文用作族氏名，早期用作專名的「姦」還未有姦淫等負面意思，只是單純的氏族徽號。西周中期金文表示偽詐，長甶盉：「井伯(邢伯)氏(祇)寅(夤)不姦。長甶蔑𤯌。」「祇夤」表示虔敬，「不姦」是不虛偽、誠篤的意思，《廣雅．釋言》：「姦，偽也。」(于省吾、陳夢家)

　　馬王堆帛書《戰國縱橫家書．李園謂辛梧章》：「燕使蔡鳥股符胠璧，姦趙入秦，以河間十城封秦相文信侯。」「姦」讀為「間」，意為偷越，蔡鳥藏符於股，藏璧於腋下，偷越趙國而往秦。《史記．大宛列傳》：「而蜀賈姦出物者，或至焉。」《漢書．張騫傳》「姦」作「間」(王輝)。
humanum_short_description: 金文從三「女」，疑本義是私通。不守婦道，紅杏出牆稱為「通姦」。古人對女人有偏見，認為女人是禍水，近女色即損德，所以「姦」字從「女」。

①陰險，虛僞，狡詐：奸人。奸狡。奸刁。奸佞。奸雄。奸智(爲非作歹的心計)。藏(cáng)奸。
②不忠於國家或自己一方的人：奸細。內奸。
③男女發生不正當的性行爲：姦淫。強姦(亦指統治者把自己的意志強加於人民，如“奸奸民意”)。通姦。

姦字的基本解释

姦
jiān
同“奸”③。

姦字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiān］
［《廣韻》古顔切，平删，見。］
亦作“姧1”。亦作“奸2”。
(1)奸邪；罪恶。
(2)指外乱。《左传·成公十七年》：“臣聞亂在外爲姦。”《国语·晋语六》：“亂在内爲宄，在外爲姦。”一说指内乱。见《楚辞·刘向〈九叹·惜贤〉》“盪渨涹之姦咎兮”汉王逸注。
(3)歹徒；恶人。
(4)指凶恶之物。
(5)奸淫；私通。
(6)盗窃。
(7)伪；虚假。
(8)指伪造、仿制。
(9)狡黠；刁滑。
(10)歹，坏。
(11)出卖国家、民族和集团利益的人。
[②]［gān］
同“奸1”。

姦字的康熙字典解释

【丑集下】【女字部】　姦； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页260第10
〔古文〕?【廣韻】古顏切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】居顏切，?音菅。【說文】私也。一曰詐也，淫也。【書·舜典】?賊姦宄。【註】劫人曰?，殺人曰賊，在外曰姦，在內曰宄。【禮·樂記】政以一其行，?以防其姦。【管子·君臣篇】止詐拘姦，厚國之道也。【張衡·西京賦】禁禦不若，以知神姦。魑魅罔兩，莫能逢旃。刪天韻本通。【字彙】叶音堅，非。　又高麗用中國書，獨以姦爲好字，好爲姦字。見【正字通】。

考證：〔【禮·學記】政以一其行，?以防其姦。〕　謹照原書學記改樂記。

金文小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
姦字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jiān］
["Guang Yun" Gu Yan cut, flat deleted, see. ]
Also known as "姧1". Also known as "rape 2".
(1) Traitor; sin.
(2) Refers to external disturbances. "Zuo Zhuan·Chenggong Seventeen Years": "The officials heard that chaos is a traitor outside." "Mandarin · Jinyu Sixth": "Chaos is a crime inside, and it is a traitor outside." One reference refers to internal strife. See "Songs of the Chu·Liu Xiang"Nine Tan·Xi Xian" "Han Wang Yi's Note" "The Tragic and Blame Xi in the Dangling River".
(3) Gangsters; villains.
(4) Refers to evil things.
(5) Adultery; fornication.
(6) Theft.
(7) False; false.
(8) Refers to forgery or imitation.
(9) Cunning; Diao slippery.
(10) Bad, bad.
(11) People who sell the interests of the country, nation, and group.
[②]［gān］
Same as "rape 1".

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 2] [Female Character Department] 　繀; Kangxi Strokes: 9; Page Number: Page 260 No. 10
[Ancient text]? [Guang Yun] Gu Yan Qi [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] Ju Yan Qi,? Yin Kan. 【Said the text】Private too. One said fraud and licentiousness. 【Book·Shun Code】? Thieves are treacherous. [Note] To rob a person is?, to kill is a thief, to be a traitor outside, and to be guilty on the inside. [Li·Le Ji] Politics are based on their actions, so as to prevent their evildoers. [Guan Zi·jun and ministers] To stop fraud and rape is the way of the country. [Zhang Heng·Xijing Fu] If you don't guard against impunity, you know the gods. There is no such thing as a misfortune. Delete Tianyun Bentong. [Vocabulary] Ye Yinjian, non.　Koryo uses Chinese books and regards evil as a good character, and good as an evil character. See [Zhengzitong]. Textual research: [[Ritual·XueJi]Politics is based on its own behavior, to prevent its evil. 〕 　I would like to change the original book Xueji to Leji.
